exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: A full body exercise that combines a squat, push-up, and jump.
instructions: Start in a standing position with your feet shoulder-width apart
Drop into a squat position and place your hands on the floor
Kick your feet back into a push-up position
Perform a push-up
Return your feet to the squat position
Jump up from the squat position with your arms extended overhead

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: A dynamic exercise that works your entire body while increasing your heart rate.
instructions: Start in a push-up position with your arms straight
Bring your right knee toward your chest
Return to the starting position
Bring your left knee toward your chest
Return to the starting position
Continue alternating legs at a fast pace

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.description: A powerful exercise that targets multiple muscle groups while providing cardiovascular benefits.
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, holding a kettlebell with both hands
Keep your back straight and hinge at the hips, swinging the kettlebell between your legs
Thrust your hips forward to swing the kettlebell up to chest height
Allow the kettlebell to fall back down between your legs
Repeat the movement in a continuous motion

exercises.name: Thrusters
exercises.description: A compound exercise that combines a front squat with an overhead press.
instructions: Hold a pair of dumbbells at shoulder height, palms facing each other
Stand with feet shoulder-width apart
Lower into a squat position, keeping your back straight
As you stand up, press the dumbbells overhead
Lower the dumbbells back to shoulder height as you return to the squat position
Repeat the movement in a continuous motion

exercises.name: Turkish Get-Up
exercises.description: A complex movement that improves stability, coordination, and strength.
instructions: Lie on your back with a kettlebell held in one hand, arm extended
Bend the knee on the same side as the kettlebell, placing your foot flat on the floor
Roll onto your elbow on the opposite side from the kettlebell
Push up onto your hand, lifting your torso
Sweep your straight leg underneath you and kneel
Stand up while keeping the kettlebell overhead
Reverse the movement to return to the starting position

exercises.name: Bear Crawl
exercises.description: A quadrupedal movement that builds strength and coordination.
instructions: Start on all fours with your hands under your shoulders and knees under your hips
Lift your knees slightly off the ground
Move forward by moving your right hand and left foot simultaneously
Then move your left hand and right foot
Keep your back flat and core engaged throughout the movement
Continue crawling forward for the desired distance

exercises.name: Man Makers
exercises.description: A challenging full-body exercise that combines several movements.
instructions: Start in a push-up position with a dumbbell in each hand
Perform a push-up
Pull the right dumbbell up into a row
Return the dumbbell to the floor
Pull the left dumbbell up into a row
Return the dumbbell to the floor
Jump your feet forward to your hands
Stand up and perform a dumbbell clean and press
Return to the starting position and repeat
